banners.text: Providing experienced technical representation for our suppliers to the industries and customers.

features.title: Electrical Equipment Trade
features.text: The Company will brokerage services for a selection of electrical equipment procured from U.S.-based manufacturers and imported from China.

features.title: Chemicals Trade
features.text: Zhonghao International LLC will offer a variety of chemicals and related products, including compressed gas, chemical additives, catalytic agents, and synthetic rubber,to the manufacturing, construction, and mining industries.

history.title: OUR SHORT HISTORY
history.text: Our long-term goal is to become the preferred import company for the chemical and mining industry.

chart.title: U.S. International Trade in Goods and Services
chart.text: Now being impacted by the global economy, trading goods and services among different countries has been a significant part for business. According to the data from Bureau of Economic Analysis, exports were $2,500.0 billion in 2018, up $148.9 billion from 2017. Imports were $3,121.0 billion, up $217.7 billion from 2017. Even though trading business is absolutely affected by the policy preference and economic trends, it still demonstrates a increasing lines in not only exports but also imports of US.
chart.imgDeclare: [1] Source: IBISWorld, Wholesale Trade Agents and Brokers Industry, Industry Report 2018
